testcase.name: Test phases.go Should be able to stop the phase on first attempt
Test phases.go Should fail to start the phase
Test phases.go Should NOT invoke status more than PHASE_RETRY times
Test phases.go Should start the phase
Test phases.go Should be able to stop the phase on second attempt
Test phases.go Should check status of a phase
Test phases.go Should NOT try to invoke stop more than PHASE_RETRY times
